snippet.title: Sakura Tempest - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
VISUAL NOVEL *YAOI* GAME

Game description:
Inspired by Japanese Visual Novels and Dating Games, Sakura Tempest is made for the player to enjoy an interactive game featuring original graphics and sounds.

You will be playing Shōtarō, an average high school boy who meets lots of new friends, foes and possible lovers at his new school. After completing the prologue you will be able to choose a suitor. Your choices will influence Shōtarō's high school experience and his personal life!

Follow the main character Shōtarō's everyday life and meet his friends and possible love interests!

Social networks:
Twitter: @sakuratempest0 
https://twitter.com/sakuratempest0

Facebook: Sakura Tempest Visual Novel 
https://de-de.facebook.com/sakuratempest/

Instagram: sakuratempest
https://www.instagram.com/sakuratempest/

Where to *BUY*:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/934090/Sakura_Tempest/

#Sakura Tempest
#Teaser Video 
#VISUALNOVELGAME
#YAOI
